projects.title: Resistor Calculator
projects.description: The calculator is a web app that allows users to calculate the value in Ohms of an electrical resistance based on the colors of its bands. It the color coding standard used in electrical resistors, where each color represents a numerical value.
projects.linkAlt: GitHub repository for Resistor Calculator (opens in a new tab)
